channel.title: Announcing Whonix Qubes news in Whonix Blog?
channel.description:
Do you wish to announce your news in Whonix blog? So you could amplify your voice and advertise Whonix's Qubes support more. Blog posts get automatically mirrored in Whonix appropriate sub forums, https://www.facebook.com/Whonix, https://twitter.com/Whonix and manually by me to https://twitter.com/Whonix. If so, please create an account.
https://www.whonix.org/blog/wp-login.php
100% optional as well.

item.title: Announcing Whonix Qubes news in Whonix Blog?
item.dc:creator: WhonixQubes
item.description:
Patrick:

Also small things are okay. I am happy if it displays some activity.

Understood.

Patrick:

When you make a posting, please choose the category “Qubes”. Then it will automatically mirror the post in the Qubes forum. If you forget about this, I sometimes do, it’s not a big deal. The post can be moved later.

Will do.

Patrick:

Oh, and you’re of course not limited to write about Qubes.

Great. Thanks so much, Patrick!

Read full topic
item.source: Announcing Whonix Qubes news in Whonix Blog?

item.title: Announcing Whonix Qubes news in Whonix Blog?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Done.

WhonixQubes:

I’d assume that it’d be appropriate to use the main Whonix Blog for more major/important news announcements.

Also small things are okay. I am happy if it displays some activity.

WhonixQubes:

For smaller less important updates, I could still make use of the Whonix Qubes forum like I have been.

As you prefer.

When you make a posting, please choose the category “Qubes”. Then it will automatically mirror the post in the Qubes forum. If you forget about this, I sometimes do, it’s not a big deal. The post can be moved later.

Oh, and you’re of course not limited to write about Qubes.

Read full topic
item.source: Announcing Whonix Qubes news in Whonix Blog?

item.title: Announcing Whonix Qubes news in Whonix Blog?
item.dc:creator: WhonixQubes
item.description:
I’ve made a Whonix Blog account.

Username: WhonixQubes

Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Announcing Whonix Qubes news in Whonix Blog?

item.title: Announcing Whonix Qubes news in Whonix Blog?
item.dc:creator: WhonixQubes
item.description:
[quote=“Patrick, post:1, topic:524”]Do you wish to announce your news in Whonix blog? So you could amplify your voice and advertise Whonix’s Qubes support more. Blog posts get automatically mirrored in Whonix appropriate sub forums, https://www.facebook.com/Whonix, https://twitter.com/Whonix and manually by me to https://twitter.com/Whonix. If so, please create an account.

https://www.whonix.org/blog/wp-login.php

100% optional as well.[/quote]

Yes. I’d be honored to do so.

I’d assume that it’d be appropriate to use the main Whonix Blog for more major/important news announcements.

For smaller less important updates, I could still make use of the Whonix Qubes forum like I have been.

I will go make a Whonix Blog account.

Good timing, as I was soon going to do a more meaningful announcement to Whonix, Qubes, Tor communities for our recent progress, since succeeding with the initial 8.2 binaries.

Thanks Patrick!

Read full topic
item.source: Announcing Whonix Qubes news in Whonix Blog?
